name: places/ChIJzXHHNe5ZwokRxXc8Vo-hiIk
formattedAddress: 114 E 25th St Ground Floor, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 114 E 25th St Ground Floor, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text:
I came across Qwoted while looking for one of its competitors, and I am so glad I did! The quality and quantity of opportunities available on Qwoted has blown me away, and using the service has surpassed all expectations.
In addition, Qwoted's customer service is one of the best I have encountered. They take a much-appreciated proactive approach to customer service. Within a short time after using the service, I was contacted asking about my experience and to see if I needed any assistance. All of my messages to the team are quickly responded to and with a high level of consideration for my time and needs. I have been very impressed and converted to a Qwoted fan!

Within a short time after using the service, I was contacted asking about my experience and to see if I needed any assistance. originalText.text: Qwoted is an easy-to-use platform that has become a go-to for journalists and PR professionals alike. The platform offers a roundup of opportunities that will hit your inbox as many times as you designate, making it easy to see your queries in one place. Also the more you tailor your source's profiles, the more targeted the queries which is extremely helpful. My agency and I have had great success pitching to well known media properties and developing working relationships with journalists. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: This is my go-to media pitching platform. I love how I can easily view my pitch status for each opportunity. It's great to have two-way communication with the media via an in-platform chat function.  It's so valuable to be able to set specific keyword alerts so I get emails sent to me with relevant opportunities I can share with my PR clients.

It's great to have two-way communication with the media via an in-platform chat function.  It's so valuable to be able to set specific keyword alerts so I get emails sent to me with relevant opportunities I can share with my PR clients.

originalText.text: Qwoted has proven to be an invaluable resource in my work as a writer and psychologist. The platform's user-friendly interface and robust network of industry experts have greatly facilitated my research process, enabling me to deliver high-quality content to my clients with ease. I highly recommend Qwoted to anyone seeking a reliable and efficient source for expert insights and quotes.

originalText.text: I have used competitor websites but Qwoted is probably the best. I like that you can see who else has sent a pitch, when the pitch has been read, and can communicate with the person in the website. It makes pitching so much easier. There is so much information about each pitch that you can read before you spend your time writing a pitch. I would recommend this site to anyone who is pitching their ideas. Great job!
